Wedding
Dance
Lessons

New Jersey

The wedding dance is one of the most important dances in your life. You look perfect and the whole audience is looking at you. Also, it becomes the favorite moment you like to play on videos and photos. Feel the moment

Our Services

We want to make your wedding day perfect that is why suggest a lot of options for dance: not only for a bride and groom but for their friends and relatives

For Bride and Groom

  • First Dance
  • Parent & Child Dance

For Guests

  • Groomsmen Dance
  • Parent Dance
  • Children’s Dance

Other events

  • Bridal Party Dance
  • Anniversary Dance

What we offer

Our goal is not only to teach you how to dance but also give the best unforgettable memories about preparing to your event

Talented Coaches

Cozy rooms for training

Coffee, tea, and cookies

Good physical form

Self Confidence and success on your event

Exciting emotions and a lot of fun

Great photos from your event

Spend hours together in happiness
